settings.title: Crown series
settings.copy: This emblem represents our crowned collection of Pudgy Penguins most notable, highly sought after hero characters. Rarest of them all!

settings.title: Hatched egg series
settings.copy: If you find this emblem, inside the box you will discover an ultra rare digital trait to redeem in PudgyWorld. You are one of the few with this digital trait!

settings.title: Fish Series
settings.copy: This emblem is for collaborations with other known brands and characters. There are very few in circulation. What an iconic emblem!

settings.title: Medal Series
settings.copy: This emblem represents our retail exclusive release. These are scattered all over the world in limited batches to select key retailers.

settings.title: PMI NFT Series
settings.copy: Our first ever mass market licensed Web3 toy line. It was featured in the first run of 100,000 Pudgy Toys ever made and have never been made again. This badge may also be blue.

settings.title: Superstar Series
settings.copy: This emblem represents a collaboration between influencers, musicians, artists, and known content creators. These are super special!

settings.title: Wizard Series
settings.copy: This emblem represents our most limited edition releases with extremely small quantities. These are almost impossible to find.

settings.collections_copy: Use this rarity guide to learn more about the emblem on your collectible or toy! Get ready to hunt and collect these iconic emblems!
